CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 29, 1955, pg. 14, reads: "Halloween Frolic - These pretty young ladies, with their sponsor, Walt Harper, are busy making plans for their Masquerade Ball, Oct. 31, at the Royal Ballroom. Seated, left to right: Barbara Robinson, treasurer; Mamie Hamilton, president, and Alberta Thompson, recording secretary. Standing, left to right: Delores Stewart, corresponding secretary; Marlene Stevens, vice president; Mr. Harper and Marietta Reed, social chairman. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Officers of Club 54, standing from left: Delores or Dolores Stewart, Marlene Stevens, sponsor Walt Harper, Marietta Reed; seated: Barbara Robinson, Mamie Hamilton, and Alberta Thompson posed behind table with open binder during planning meeting for masquerade ball
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Harper, Walter, 1932-Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Stewart, Delores.Stevens, Marlene.Reed, Marietta.Hamilton, Mamie.Thompson, Alberta.
